title: Third British victim of Lisbon funicular crash was Anglesey man
description: Sixteen people died when the funicular crashed into a building in the Portuguese capital.
content:
The third British victim killed in the Lisbon funicular crash has been named by police.
David Young, 82, from Holyhead on Anglesey, was among 16 people who died last Wednesday when the Glória funicular derailed and crashed into a building in Portugal... [574 chars]

title: Rick Davies: Supertramp singer and co-founder dies
description: The musician, whose hits include Goodbye Stranger, Breakfast In America and The Logical Song, died after a battle with cancer, a statement from the band said.
content:
Rick Davies, a founding member of the British rock group Supertramp, has died.
The 81-year-old, who had been battling multiple myeloma - a type of blood cancer - for the last decade, died on Saturday, a statement from the band said.
The band's lead s... [2372 chars]

title: Rory McIlroy wins Irish Open but partisan crowd a timely reminder before Ryder Cup
description: Irish Open fans willing Joakim Lagergren's ball into water to help Rory McIlroy win hint at what may unfold at this month's Ryder Cup, writes Iain Carter.
content:
As Rory McIlroy addressed his eagle putt on the last hole of the Amgen Irish Open on Sunday, among the thousands surrounding the green stood two young lads clad in red and enraptured by what might happen next.
The putt from just inside 30 feet unerri... [5334 chars]

title: Netanyahu vows to 'catch everyone who helped' attackers, after six killed in Jerusalem shooting
description: At least seven others have been seriously wounded in a shooting attack, paramedics and police say.
content:
An attack that has left Jerusalem reeling
Imogen James
Live reporter
On the border of East and West Jerusalem at 10:15 local time (08:15 BST), two suspects pulled up to a bus stop at Remot Junction and opened fire.

title: André Onana agrees to join Trabzonspor on loan from Manchester United
description: André Onana’s move to Trabzonspor is expected to be completed on Monday after the Manchester United goalkeeper agreed to a season’s loan
content:
André Onana’s move to Trabzonspor is expected to be completed on Monday after the Manchester United goalkeeper agreed to a season’s loan to the Turkish club.
Onana had believed he would stay at United but after Senne Lammens was signed from Royal Ant... [1096 chars]
